sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.normalTotalDetail
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 流水号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101','yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006/86400 +8/24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select distinct tSurrender.c1 c1 from #type# tSurrender,{WF:App_DealProcess} tproc where tproc.c700020002=#typestr# and tproc.c700020001=tSurrender.c1 and (tSurrender.c700000010='已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010='待归档') #persongroup# #seltime# ) baseid,#type# tSurrender where tSurrender.c1=baseid.c1

sqlquery.name: kpi.surrender.normalTotalDetailWait
sqlquery.select: select /*COUNT*/ tSurrender.c1 baseid, tSurrender.c700000003 as 流水号, to_char(TO_DATE('19700101','yyyymmdd') + tSurrender.c700000006/86400 +8/24,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:MI:ss') 建单时间, tSurrender.c700000004 as 建单人, tSurrender.c700000011 as 主题, tSurrender.c700000015 as 紧急程度, tSurrender.c700000014 as 所属专业, tSurrender.c700000010 as 工单状态 /*COUNT*/ from (select distinct tSurrender.c1 c1 from #type# tSurrender,{WF:App_DealProcess} tproc where tproc.c700020002=#typestr# and tproc.c700020001=tSurrender.c1 and (tSurrender.c700000010='已归档' or tSurrender.c700000010='待归档') #persongroup# and tSurrender.C1 in (select t.c700020001 from T331 t where t.c700020003 = 'dp_7' and t.C700020077 = 1 #seltime#) ) baseid,#type# tSurrender where tSurrender.c1=baseid.c1
